name: On Thin Ice 3: Rookie Mistake
description:
For the UE4 2018 Winter Jam

You play as detectives Payne and Murphy. 

Your cover's been blown, do you have what it takes to make the XMGY PD proud, or will you be just another body in the woods and another tally mark on the walls of the drug lords of the underworld of the abyss.

Jammers:

Nick Boen

Jared Brooks
